data.description: Introduces students to the biological effects of drugs on human health. Emphasis on how drugs, especially those used in diseases of major human health significance, act in the body. Drugs that are abused also will be covered. This course is not intended for medical, nursing, pharmacy, and physician assistant students.
data.title: DRUGS AND THEIR ACTIONS

data.description: Underlying science and pharmacological actions of drugs and the biological effects of drugs on human health. Covers drugs used to treat common illnesses and diseases as well as commonly abused drugs.
data.title: PHARMACOLOGY PRINCIPLES AND APPLICATIONS
